queries.query:
from(bucket: "jokley_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["dev_eui"] == "a8404137e186804e")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_Hum_SHT")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "jokley_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["dev_eui"] == "a8404137e186804e")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_Hum_SHT" or r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_TempC_SHT")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "jokley_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["dev_eui"] == "a8404137e186804e")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_TempC_SHT")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "jokley_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "outdoor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_frmpayload_data_BatV")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "jokley_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["dev_eui"] == "939a5a2c2e0b587f" or r["dev_eui"] == "a8404137e186804e" or r["dev_eui"] == "a840418c51868361")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rssi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_uplink")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application_name"] == "jokley")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "fan" or r["device_name"] == "outdoor" or r["device_name"] == "probe01")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
